step_original: Exemption by virtue of Articles 3 and 4 of regulation 2019/2122 (animals intended for scientific purposes, research and diagnostic samples)
step_description: Your trade is exempted according to Article 3 and 4 of regulation 2019/2122 (animals intended for scientific purposes, research and diagnostic samples)
step_howto_description: You trade is exempted if your goods are for scientific or research usage or for use as diagnostic samples.
